text: Abdul Halim is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Jessore-6. ==Career== Halim was elected to parliament from Jessore-6 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Abdul Halim (politician)
